title: Lovely Unfurn/Furnish 3 bed Apt, 2 Blocks to Brown Avail Now or 20-21
description: This beautiful, spacious, renovated, well-located, 3 bedroom, 2nd floor apt is on Preston St (between Hope St and Ives St) and is close to everything at Brown University. It can be rented furnished or unfurnished for January, February, Spring, or the 2020-2021 academic year.  The apt is located is in the heart of College Hill and is just 2 blocks from Brown University and close walking distance to RISD, Rhode Island Hospital, Hasbro Hospital, Thayer St, Wickenden St, Wayland Square, Whole Foods, Eastside Marketplace, Starbucks, Walgreens, bus stop, restaurants, & shops. It’s also biking distance to Butler and Miriam Hospitals. The apt has lovely hardwoods, tall ceilings, kitchen with updated stainless steel appliances, microwave, coffeemaker, dishwasher, garbage disposal, nice dining table, & kitchenware.The bathroom has an Ikea sink & vanity, clawfoot tub & shower, and marble floors. Free laundry is available in the basement and plenty of closet storage is available. There is a large yard and parking lot in back of the house with one off-street parking space included with the rental.  A second parking space is negotiable for a monthly fee. WIFI is available. Pets ok with pet fee. 1 block to a park. This apt has housed many happy undergraduate & graduate students, visiting scholars, speakers, professors, travel nurses and other professionals. $2250-$2400 per month (depending on if you are renting unfurnished or furnished, or $750-$800 per person for 3 people if you can find your own roommates. Price and lease length negotiable. Owner is willing to consider short-term monthly rentals for the Spring and 1 year leases for the 2020-2021 academic year.  Feel free to email me if you are looking for safe, affordable furnished housing close to Brown for January, February, Spring, or the 2020-2021 academic year in Providence, Ri.

title: Lovely Unfurn/Furnish 2-3 bed Apt Wayland Square Avail Feb or 2020-21
description: This beautiful, well-located 2-3 bedroom, 2nd floor unfurnished or furnished apt is located in College Hill's Wayland Square in an amazing neighborhood close to all amenities on a quiet, beautiful, residential street  It's available February 1 and for the Spring, Summer, or 2020-2021 academic year as an unfurnished rental for $2100 per month or as a furnished rental for $2250 per month.  Price and lease length negotiable. Owner is willing to consider short-term monthly rentals for the Spring and 1 year leases for the 2020-2021 academic year

The apt is close walking or biking distance to Brown & RISD, Rhode Island Hospital, Hasbro Hospital, Butler and Miriam Hospitals, Thayer St, Wickenden St, and is 2-3 blocks walk to trendy Wayland Square, Whole Foods, Eastside Marketplace, Walgreens, Starbucks, restaurants, shops, a 5 block walk to Blackstone Blvd, the best scenic, running, walking, biking trail in the city,  1 block walk to the playground, & bus stop, and 2 blocks walk to the dog park. Pets allowed for a pet fee. Blackout curtains are also available.  This apt has housed many happy undergraduate & graduate students, visiting scholars, speakers, professors, travel nurses and other professionals. $2250 if rented as a furnished 2-3 bedroom. $2100 if rented as an unfurnished 2-3 bedroom. Brown, RISD, downtown Providence and the hospitals are easily accessible by walking straight down historic Angell St.  If you want an apt that is beautiful, safe, and central to the colleges and downtown this is the perfect place for those looking to work and live near Brown and RISD and the best that College Hill has to offer. description: Awesome new single family cottage next to all the great shops and restaurants/

The Oak floors, a gorgeous new solid wood kitchen with built-in microwave, 5 burner gas stove and 1.5 beautiful new baths, there's a/c, laundry in unit, and a dining area separate from the kitchen.

Walk to everything while you live in this beautiful place.
Fabulous walk-able neighborhood with lots to do and easy highway access.
This is a quiet house with no parties, no students, and NO SMOKING.
We are pet friendly, as long as you have a quiet, well behaved pet.
We cannot accept aggressive animals or breeds prohibited by the insurance company.
Small fees apply: $150 one time pet fee and $15/month pet rent.
The rent is $2,200/month and the lease has a reward clause for those who pay on time before noon on the 1st of the month, deduct $100 making the rent $2,100/month.
The water, sewer and trash pick up are included in the rent.
The gas and electric are separately metered and your cost is based on your usage.
That should be very modest as everything is new and efficient and insulated.
Applicants should have excellent credit and verifiable rental and employment histories.
1 month deposit is due with the submission of your application to hold the place off the market while we check your references.
Upon approval that will become your security deposit.
If you are not accepted, your check will be voided and a picture of the voided check texted to you.
To set up a time to view this place, please TEXT your Name and apartment code #29D (so we know which place you are inquiring about) to
Let us know several days and times that would work for you to meet and see the place.
The house is available starting February 1st as the 1st resident needs to move.
Thanks so much for your interest and we look forward to hearing from you.

title: Available Room w/ Walk-in in Big, Beautiful Shared House
description: This room is a 12x12ft bedroom with an adjoined 8x10ft second room/walk-in closet; available March 1st, 2020 (or potentially earlier if mutually agreeable). The room is on the 3rd floor of a large house, which is owned by the landlord, and shared by 5 other roommates. It is a hassle-free place to live with trustworthy roommates, a dependable landlord, and a very reasonable price.

Current roommates are young professionals and graduate students, all in their mid-20's. The household is well maintained and cared for, but still very relaxed and reasonable. Visitors are welcomed, but never excessive or unruly - when parties occur, it is a group decision . Everyone comes together as a household nicely, but remain independent for the most part... and just as a disclaimer, this is not a co-op home.

The location of the house is wonderful. It is two doors down from the Billy Taylor Park; in walking distance from Whole Foods, Thayer St, Hope Artisan Village, Lippitt Park, and Blackstone Blvd; accessible to multiple bus lines in 1-3 block radius; and easy access to I-95 by car.
- No pets in the house (although a cat could be negotiable with landlord and roommates)
WiFi, Gas, and Electric not included in rent, but range from $40-$75/month throughout the year.

The room will be rented unfurnished; however, there are many items I am happy to leave in the room if desired (i.e. bed and/or bed-frame, desk, dresser, small pull-out couch, and others). Additionally, the rest of the house is furnished, but does have space for more items if so desired.

I am moving because of taking a job out-of-state, but otherwise I wouldn't see any reason to leave this home - truly a great place to live. That said, I will be showing the room/house whenever convenient. Call, text, or email and I am happy to schedule a showing.
